    Plot Results and Save Figures

    plot_results.Rd

    This function compiles results from species distribution models (SDMs) output of the clean_and_resample function for which it generates plots, and saves the figures.

    plot_results(srvy, dir_out, dir_final = NULL)

    Arguments

    srvy

    A character string specifying the survey identifier.

    dir_out

    A character string specifying the directory for output files.

    dir_final

    A character string specifying the directory for new result files.

    Value

    A list of plots and tables generated during the function execution.

    Details

    This function performs the following steps:

    • Creates a directory for saving images.

    • Searches for relevant files in the output directory.

    • Compiles data from the found files.

    • Saves the compiled data into CSV files.

    • Generates various plots such as boxplots and time series of biomass estimates.

    • TO DO: CREATE BIO PLOTS

    • Saves the generated plots as PNG files.

    • Saves the list of plots in an RData file.

    Examples

    dir_out <- here::here("vignettes", "output")
srvy <- "CA"
plot_results(srvy = srvy, dir_out = dir_out) 
#> Error in fit_df %>% dplyr::bind_rows(utils::read.csv(paste0(aaa[i], "/fit_df.csv"))): could not find function "%>%"
